author: mszefler
msg: Moved DAO interfaces out of the bpel-api module into dedicated bpel-dao module.

author: jukka
msg: All PMC lists were recently renamed from pmc@ to private@. Updated the mail templates accordingly.

author: mszefler
msg: Moved EPR code into separate module.

author: remm
msg: - API change for the constructor of Loader: if not specified, the loader will get the parent CL from the context,
avoiding the problems of ignoring the privileged flag in some cases as seen in bug 39704.
